array.author: buddha
array.quote: Give, even if you only have a little.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Irrigators channel waters; fletchers straighten arrows; carpenters bend wood; the wise master themselves.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Drop by drop is the water pot filled. Likewise, the wise man, gathering it little by little, fills himself with good.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If you knew what I know about the power of giving, you would not let a single meal pass without sharing it in some way.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The root of suffering is attachment.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Silence the angry man with love. Silence the ill-natured man with kindness. Silence the miser with generosity. Silence the liar with truth.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: People with opinions just go around bothering each other.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Even as a solid rock is unshaken by the wind, so are the wise unshaken by praise or blame.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Meditate… do not delay, lest you later regret it.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Understanding is the heartwood of well-spoken words.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Ceasing to do evil, Cultivating the good, Purifying the heart: This is the teaching of the Buddhas.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Delight in meditation and solitude. Compose yourself, be happy. You are a seeker.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Ardently do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow, death comes.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Purity and impurity depend on oneself; no one can purify another.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: What you are is what you have been. What you’ll be is what you do now.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If you propose to speak always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If you find no one to support you on the spiritual path, walk alone. (This is one of my favorite Buddha quote. Leave a reply and let me know what’s yours!)

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart. Buddha

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise. Buddha

array.author: buddha
array.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. Buddha

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Stop, stop. Do not speak. The ultimate truth is not even to think.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Just as the great ocean has one taste, the taste of salt, so also this teaching and discipline has one taste, the taste of liberation.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The one in whom no longer exist the craving and thirst that perpetuate becoming; how could you track that Awakened one, trackless, and of limitless range.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Long is the night to him who is awake; long is a mile to him who is tired; long is life to the foolish who do not know the true law.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Whatever precious jewel there is in the heavenly worlds, there is nothing comparable to one who is Awakened.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think. Joy follows a pure thought like a shadow that never leaves.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Like a fine flower, beautiful to look at but without scent, fine words are fruitless in a man who does not act in accordance with them.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Our theories of the eternal are as valuable as are those which a chick which has not broken its way through its shell might form of the outside world.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Attachment leads to suffering.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: May all beings have happy minds.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Born out of concern for all beings.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: I am the miracle.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: You only lose what you cling to.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A jug fills drop by drop.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: One who acts on truth is happy in this world and beyond.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Every human being is the author of his own health or disease.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The tongue like a sharp knife… Kills without drawing blood.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: You can only lose what you cling to.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: As you walk and eat and travel, be where you are. Otherwise you will miss most of your life.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A man asked Gautama Buddha, “I want happiness.” Buddha said, “First remove “I,” that’s Ego, then remove “want,” that’s Desire. See now, you are left with only “Happiness”.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The foot feels the foot when it feels the ground.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A dog is not considered a good dog because he is a good barker. A man is not considered a good man because he is a good talker.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If we destroy something around us we destroy ourselves. If we cheat another, we cheat ourselves.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Every experience, no matter how bad it seems, holds within it a blessing of some kind. The goal is to find it.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Doubt everything. Find your own light.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Just as a snake sheds its skin, we must shed our past over and over again.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Meditate. Live purely. Be quiet. Do your work with mastery. Like the moon, come out from behind the clouds! Shine.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: My doctrine is not a doctrine but just a vision. I have not given you any set rules, I have not given you a system.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: In the sky, there is no distinction of east and west; people create distinctions out of their own minds and then believe them to be true.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: What you think you create, what you feel you attract, what you imagine you become.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: When you like a flower, you just pluck it. But when you love a flower, you water it daily.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Life is so very hard. How can we be anything but kind?

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Live every act fully, as if it were your last.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Nothing ever exists entirely alone; everything is in relation to everything else.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Purity or impurity depends on oneself. No one can purify another.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: To support mother and father, to cherish wife and child and to have a simple livelihood; this is the good luck.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: One moment can change a day, one day can change a life and one life can change the world.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If we fail to look after others when they need help, who will look after us?

array.author: buddha
array.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one’s own in the midst of abundance.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: She who knows life flows, feels no wear or tear, needs no mending or repair.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Should a seeker not find a companion who is better or equal, let them resolutely pursue a solitary course.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: True love is born from understanding.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Ambition is like love, impatient both of delays and rivals.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Love is a gift of one’s inner most soul to another so both can be whole.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Let all-embracing thoughts for all beings be yours.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: We will develop and cultivate the liberation of mind by lovingkindness, make it our vehicle, make it our basis, stabilize it, exercise ourselves in it, and fully perfect it.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Hatred does not cease through hatred at any time. Hatred ceases through love. This is an unalterable law.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: As rain falls equally on the just and the unjust, do not burden your heart with judgments but rain your kindness equally on all.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: He who loves 50 people has 50 woes; he who loves no one has no woes.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Kindness should become the natural way of life, not the exception.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Speak only endearing speech, speech that is welcomed. Speech, when it brings no evil to others, is a pleasant thing.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: One is not called noble who harms living beings. By not harming living beings one is called noble.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Being deeply learned and skilled, being well trained and using well spoken words: this is good luck.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Just as a mother would protect her only child with her life, even so let one cultivate a boundless love towards all beings.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: In whom there is no sympathy for living beings: know him as an outcast.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn’t learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn’t learn a little, at least we didn’t get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn’t die; so, let us all be thankful.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Those attached to the notion ‘I am’ and to views roam the world offending people.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Men, driven on by thirst, run about like a snared hare; let therefore mendicant drive out thirst, by striving after passionlessness for himself.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: When one has the feeling of dislike for evil, when one feels tranquil, one finds pleasure in listening to good teachings; when one has these feelings and appreciates them, one is free of fear.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: He is able who thinks he is able.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: It is a man’s own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Delight in heedfulness! Guard well your thoughts!

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Everything is based on mind, is led by mind, is fashioned by mind. If you speak and act with a polluted mind, suffering will follow you, as the wheels of the oxcart follow the footsteps of the ox.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: There is nothing so disobedient as an undisciplined mind, and there is nothing so obedient as a disciplined mind.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: You are a seeker. Delight in the mastery of your hands and your feet, of your words and your thoughts.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: See them, floundering in their sense of mine, like fish in the puddles of a dried-up stream — and, seeing this, live with no mine, not forming attachment for states of becoming.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: All experiences are preceded by mind, having mind as their master, created by mind.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one’s family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one’s own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: All wrong-doing arises because of mind. If mind is transformed can wrong-doing remain?

array.author: buddha
array.quote: What we are today comes from our thoughts of yesterday, and our present thoughts build our life of tomorrow: Our life is the creation of our mind.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The one who has conquered himself is a far greater hero than he who has defeated a thousand times a thousand men.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Transcendental intelligence rises when the intellectual mind reaches its limit and if things are to be realized in their true and essential nature, its processes of thinking must be transcended by an appeal to some higher faculty of cognition.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The external world is only a manifestation of the activities of the mind itself, and the mind grasps it as an external world simply because of its habit of discrimination and false-reasoning. The disciple must get into the habit of looking at things truthfully.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Mind precedes all mental states. Mind is their chief; they are all mind-wrought.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: If with a pure mind a person speaks or acts happiness follows him like his never-departing shadow.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. Buddha

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: The enlightened one, intent on jhana, should find delight in the forest, should practice jhana at the foot of a tree, attaining his own satisfaction.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

array.author: buddha
array.quote: Set your heart on doing good. Do it over and over again, and you will be filled with joy.
